linkbase.documentation: Covers distinction of operations into acquisitions, continuing and discontinued

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Consolidation
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent components of consolidated accounts.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain-Restatements
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables distinction of restated items as well as amounts for various types of restatement.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Subsidiaries
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all subisidiaries and individual subsidiaires

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Joint-Ventures
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all joint-ventures and individual joint-ventures.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Associates
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all associates and individual associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Business Segments
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all business segments and individual business segments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Geographic Segments
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all geographic segments and individual geographic segments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Operating Activities
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables distinction of operations into existing, acquisitions, continuing and discontinued

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Exceptional Items
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables distinction of Income / P&L items between exceptional items related sub-totals

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Exceptional Items and Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables distinction of Income / P&L items between exceptional items, related amortisation and related sub-totals

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Acquisition Assets and Liabilities
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent standard breakdown of acquisition assets and liabilities.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Provisions Classes
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all classes of provisions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Intangible Fixed Asset Classes
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all classes of intangible fixed assets.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Tangible Fixed Asset Classes
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all classes of tangible fixed assets.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Tangible Fixed Asset Ownership
definitionLink.documentation: Used for definition of members of dimension. Enables identification of values for all types of ownership of tangible fixed assets.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Fixed Asset Investments
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent forms of holdings of fixed asset investments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Fixed Asset Investment Types
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent types of fixed asset investments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Fair Values
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent total fair value and changes to fair value.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Dimension Domain: Dividends
definitionLink.documentation: Used to represent standard breakdown of dividend payments between paid and proposed.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Income Data All Dimensions
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for full set of income data dimensions: operating activities, exceptional items, amortisation of goodwill and related items, joint-ventures, associates, segments and consolidated totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Income Data All Dimensions
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use full set of dimensions for income data (operating activities, exceptional items, amortisation, joint-ventures, associates, segments and consolidated totals).

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for exceptional items and amortisation of goodwill and related items

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use exceptional items, amortisation dimension

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: JVs, Assocs, Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities, exceptional items and amortisation of goodwill and related items, joint-ventures and associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: JVs, Assocs, Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use dimensions for exceptional items, amortisation, joint-ventures, associates and consolidated totals).

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Op Activities, Exceptional Items
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities and exceptional items.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Op Activities, Exceptional Items
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use operating activities, exceptional items dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activity, Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities, exceptional items and amortisation of goodwill and impairment.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activity, Exceptional Items, Amortisation
Primary Items: Operating Activity, Exceptional Items, Amortisation
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use operating activities, exceptional items, amortisation dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activities, JVs, Assocs, Geog, Business
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities, joint-ventures, associates. business and geographic segments, consolidated totals

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activities, JVs, Assocs, Geog, Business
Primary Items: Operating Activities, JVs, Assocs, Geog, Business
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use operating activities, jvs, associates, geographic segment, business segment and consolidated dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activities, JVs, Assocs
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities, joint-ventures and associates.and consolidated totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Operating Activities, JVs, Assocs
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use operating activities, joint ventures, associates and consolidation dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Consolidation, Op Activities
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for consolidation and operating activities

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Consolidation, Op Activities
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use consolidation and operating activities dimensions

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Operating Activities
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for operating activities.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items Operating Activities
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use operating activities dimension
Defines dimensions / hypercube for joint-ventures

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Joint-Ventures
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use joint-ventures dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Associates
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for associates

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Associates
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use associates dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Business Segments Income Data
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for business segments for income data: includes business segments, exceptional items, goodwill amortisation, related totals, joint-ventures and associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Business Income Data
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use business segment income data dimensions, which include business segments, exceptional items, goodwill amortisation, related totals, joint-ventures and associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Geographic Segments Income Data
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for geographic segments for income data: includes geographic segments, exceptional items, goodwill amortisation, related totals, joint-ventures and associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Geographic Income Data
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use geographic segments income data dimensions, which include geographic segments, exceptional items, goodwill amortisation, related totals, joint-ventures and associates.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Business Segments Asset Data
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for business segments for asset data: includes business segments, joint-ventures, associates and related totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Business Segments Asset Data
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use business segment asset data dimensions, which include business segments, joint-ventures, associates and related totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Geographic Segments Asset Data
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for geographic segments for asset data: includes geographic segments, joint-ventures, associates and related totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Geographic Segments Asset Data
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use geographic segment asset data dimensions, which include geographic segments, joint-ventures, associates and related totals.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Business Segments Basic
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for basic business segments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Business Segments Basic
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use basic business segments dimension

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Geographic Segments Basic
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for basic geographic segments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Geographic Segments Basic
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use basic geographic segments dimension

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Acquisition Assets and Liabilities
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for acquisition assets and liabilities: includes custom dimension and dimensions for joint-ventures, associaties and subsidiaries.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Acquisition Assets and Liabilities
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use acquisition assets and liabilities dimensions, which include a custom dimension and dimensions for joint-ventures, associaties and subsidiaries.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Provisions
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for provisions

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Provisions
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use Provisions dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Intangible Fixed Assets
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for intangible fixed assets

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Intangible Fixed Assets
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use Intangible Fixed Assets dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Tangible Fixed Assets
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for tangible fixed assets

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Tangible Fixed Assets
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use Tangible Fixed Assets dimensions.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Fixed Asset Investments
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for fixed asset investments

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Fixed Asset Investments
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use fixed asset investments dimensions

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Fixed Asset Investment Loans
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for fixed asset investment loans

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Fixed Asset Investment Loans
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use fixed asset investment loans dimensions

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Fair Values
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for financial instrument fair values

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Fair Values
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use fair values dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Subsidiaries
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimensions / hypercube for individual subsidaries dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Subsidaries
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use subsidiaries dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Restatements
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimension / hypercube for restatements dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Restatements
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use restatements dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Hypercube: Dividends
definitionLink.documentation: Defines dimension / hypercube for dividends dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Primary Items: Dividends
definitionLink.documentation: Groups items which use dividends dimension.

definitionLink.xlink:title: Essence-Alias Links
definitionLink.documentation: Groups essence-alias links for the taxonomy
